title: Legal battle erupts over inheritance of former richest man in China
subhead: Zong Qinghou, founder of the Wahaha beverage empire who died in 2024, reportedly fathered three children from an extramarital affair. These children are now contesting the late tycoon's inheritance with his legitimate daughter, who has become CEO of the company.

title: Senegal seeks to shed light on political violence committed under Macky Sall
subhead: According to Amnesty International, at least 65 people were killed during protests against the government between 2021 and 2024. The justice minister has referred the matter to the public prosecutor to investigate the deaths.

title: Magda Gegenava, chef: 'I became familiar with street food and adapted my recipes so they could be eaten on the go'
subhead: 'Refuge Recipes' (3/6). This summer, chefs from Refugee Food, a group celebrating its 10th anniversary, are sharing the dish that best defines them. Gegenava is a self-taught chef from Georgia who owns two Paris restaurants, where her khinkalis – plump, juicy dumplings – have become the signature dish.

subhead: 'Chefs' Gardens' (5/5). The father-son duo have brought back countless varieties of plants from their travels abroad, showcasing them in their dishes at Le Suquet, their restaurant in southern France.
